name: UmbracoCloudDeploy
description: This task deploys umbraco from DevOps pipeline to Umbraco Cloud
author: Kamil Cyganiak
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: cloudRepoUrl
inputs.label: Umbraco Cloud Repository Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Umbraco Cloud Repository Url where initial push should happen. I.e. '{dev-name}.s1.umbraco.io/{guid}.git'

inputs.name: gitUserName
inputs.label: Git User Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git User Name visible on commit in Umbraco Cloud portal

inputs.name: gitUserEmail
inputs.label: Git User Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git User Email visible on commit in Umbraco Cloud portal

inputs.name: gitCommitMessage
inputs.label: Git Commit Message
inputs.defaultValue: Committing build output from Azure DevOps
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git Commit Message visible on commit in Umbraco Cloud portal

inputs.name: gitCommitAuthor
inputs.label: Git Commit Author
inputs.helpMarkDown: Git commit author visible on commit in Umbraco Cloud portal
